message: Has our canadian dollar really that strong now??
Apple's Canadian web site confirms the March 25 launch and the 16 gig wifi is $519.
Awesome! Is it just me or is 519$ a few dollars cheaper than what it was last year?
Here's the press release confirming the Canadian launch http://www.apple.com/pr/library/2011/03/22ipad.html
Gary just said it'll start to sell at 5pm? I thought someone said it was gonna be at 8am on the blog?
Yes. It is cheaper. It was $549 last year.
I just posted the 5 p.m. time on the Twitter account based on the press release. I think the Best Buy employee was wrong.
500 pm is on the Best Buy Website http://cl.ly/5Q52
Figured that would happen. Thanks for posting.
Welcome , i was curious myself so I stopped by a local Best Buy today !
@johncpiercy Did they say anything about their stock?
Didn't say much. I got the impression it would be limited ;(
I'm already mentally preparing myself to have to wait several weeks.
